descriptions.totalInsertions: Total insertions by component sets over time (excluding icons)
descriptions.topInsertions: Components with the most insertions in the last {days} days (excluding icons)
descriptions.topDetachments: Components with the most detachments in the last {days} days (excluding icons)
descriptions.componentsList: View and explore your data in tabular format (sorted by insertions, excluding icons)
descriptions.teamInstances: Distribution of component instances across teams (top 10 teams shown, rest grouped as Other)
descriptions.changelog: Component library version history and updates
